title.rendered: Juice USB Type C – Apple Lightning, 2m Charger and Sync Cable for Apple iPhone 12, 12 Mini, SE, 11, XS, XR, X, 8, 7, 6…

content.rendered:
Juice USB Type C to Apple Lightning cost and sync Cable with 1M size is made for iPhone, iPad and iPod. Compatible with Apple Lightning and USB Type-C units. Ideal for computer systems, tablets and mobiles. It helps quick cost when used with PD mains charger. The Juice USB-C to Lightning cost and sync Cable makes use of the most recent expertise to switch knowledge sooner than ever earlier than. Compatible with energy Delivery quick chargers so you possibly can cost your cell as much as 50% in solely half-hour. Device compatibility: iPhone 5 via to iPhone 11, lightning appropriate iPads and iPods and Mac fashions. Available in varied colors.

Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Made for Apple iPhone, iPad and iPod
Compatible with Apple Lightning Devices
Ideal for computer systems, tablets and mobiles
Ce Certified
Please not this can be a USB C – Lightning NOT USB A
